description:
### 8.17 adynamicsmooth

Apply dynamic smoothing to input audio stream.

A description of the accepted options follows.

**sensitivity**

    Set an amount of sensitivity to frequency fluctations. Default is 2. Allowed range is from 0 to 1e+06. 

**basefreq**

    Set a base frequency for smoothing. Default value is 22050. Allowed range is from 2 to 1e+06.
name: adynamicsmooth

options.description: Set an amount of sensitivity to frequency fluctations. Default is 2. Allowed range is from 0 to 1e+06.
options.name: sensitivity

options.description: Set a base frequency for smoothing. Default value is 22050. Allowed range is from 2 to 1e+06.
options.name: basefreq
